title: You Plan To Kill Me With Meng? - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Age Progression   Animal Characteristics   Childcare   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   First Love   Kind Love Interests   Language Barrier   Lazy Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Multiple Realms   Nationalism   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   World Hopping
author: 莫如归
description:
Qiao Qixi woke up one day to find himself transmigrated as a polar bear and he merely took more care of the injured bear next door when the other side see him in a different light.

A gay… bear?

Later he found out his guess was right. Shit, experts say the animal world is full of homosexuals, it is indeed true! He was not deceived!

And it’s happened more than once.

Afterwards, regardless of whether he was transmigrated as a lion, tiger or leopard… he would be targeted by the same sex.

Even as a peacock, there will be another peacock that will spread out its tail feathers to tempt him.

Is Qiao Qixi bothered by it, you ask?

No, he enjoys being fed by all the big guys.>
